item.title: The Myth of the To-Do List: How to Stop Measuring God’s Love by YOUR Success
item.description: Being a parent is a tough job, and I’ve learned that no matter how much we plan, there are always things that don’t go according to plan. I used to get frustrated when things didn’t work out, but I’ve come to realize that it’s okay to fail sometimes. Even when I mess up, I know that I’m still loved and accepted by God, and that gives me the strength to keep going.
